content: It sure does. I fall for it all the time. Sometimes it’s a good fall, other times it’s a nasty, scraped knees, bloody nose, split lip, concussion kind of fall. :) Are you still writing everyday, as in continuing the experiment? I know writing is your full-time, but is this part of that? If not, how much of a time commitment away from your regular biz? And, was it helpful in meeting/landing new clients? By the way, love your dog’s name :)
